diagrams.title: Reinforcement Learning
diagrams.description: Observe State → Select Action (Policy) → Receive Reward → Update Q-Table → Explore/Exploit → Loop

diagrams.title: Transfer Learning
diagrams.description: Pre-trained Model → Freeze Layers → Add Custom Head → Fine-tune Top Layers → Train on New Data

diagrams.title: Early Stopping
diagrams.description: Train Model → Monitor Validation Loss → Patience Counter → Stop if No Improvement → Best Model

diagrams.title: Active Learning
diagrams.description: Label Small Sample → Train Model → Find Uncertain Examples → Human Labels → Retrain → Loop

diagrams.title: Multi-Task Learning
diagrams.description: Shared Layers → Task-Specific Heads → Joint Training → Transfer Knowledge

diagrams.title: Self-Supervised Learning
diagrams.description: Unlabeled Data → Create Pretext Task → Train → Fine-tune → Downstream Task

diagrams.title: Contrastive Learning
diagrams.description: Augment Sample → Positive Pairs → Negative Pairs → Contrastive Loss → Representations
